meanings.definition: A cut of beef taken from between the ribs
meanings.sent1: The chef grilled the entrecotes to perfection.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a juicy entrecotes steak at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The entrecotes were so tender, they practically melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The entrecotes on my plate resembled little slices of heaven.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling entrecotes filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A dish made with entrecotes, typically grilled or pan-fried
meanings.sent1: For dinner, we enjoyed a delicious entrecotes meal.
meanings.sent2: The entrecotes dish was seasoned perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The entrecotes on the menu made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The entrecotes dish was a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The entrecotes were the highlight of the dinner party.
